muclient.script:
world_name = "stealme.fyvi"
function OnPluginCommandEntered (command)
local w = GetWorld (world_name) -- find world
-- not found? show error if not w then ColourNote ("white", "red", "World " .. world_name .. " is not open") else w:Execute (command) -- execute command (handle aliases, etc.) PushCommand (command) -- save in command history end -- if
return ("\t") -- clear command
end -- OnPluginCommandEntered
